channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2024010162
item.description:
Report X-2024010162

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO TRAILER, PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING

item.title: Report X-2024010058
item.description:
Report X-2024010058

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-10T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-22
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKING HAZMAT IN TRAILER BOX WAS A FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3 AND HAD WET SPOT-ON BOTTOM OF BOX. UPON RETURNING TO PROCESSING CENTER AND OPENING, RESPONDER DISCOVERED PLASTIC CONTAINERS OF CIDEHOL CP ALL IN INDIVIDUAL PLASTIC BAGS SEPERATED BY A DIVIDER IN THE MIDDLE AND TWO HAD LOOSE CAPS ALL 4 WERE WET

Report X-2024010067

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE FOUND LEAKING IN UNLOAD, USING THE DECISION AND WEARING THE PROPER PPE, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKER AND RETURNED TO CLERKS FOR PROCESSING

item.title: Report X-2024010081
item.description:
Report X-2024010081

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-10T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-19
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO TRAILER FOR LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER FOUND TWO BOXES, CLEANED TRAILER AND BROUGHT BACK TO CLERK ARE FOR PROCESSING. LEAKING UNDECLARED PACKAGE, 20 X 15 X 12, CONTAINED A 6.5 X 9 X 7 LED ACID BATTERY WITH NO PACKING IN THE BOX. TAPE USED TO COVER TERMINALS, WAS PARTIALLY FALLING OFF DUE TO LEAKAGE FROM BATTERY. RESPONDER PROCESSED AS UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report X-2024010080
item.description:
Report X-2024010080

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-10T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-18
  • City: MOAB
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS MADE AWARE OF THIS BOX AND UPON LOOKING AT IT RESPONDER REALIZED THAT THE INNER 8 BOXES ALL WERE MAKED WITH THE LTD-QTY LABEL WHILE THE OUTER BOX WAS NOT. RESPONDER MADE A CALL TO THE HAZMAT HELP LINE AND THEY SAID TO HOLD IT AND TAKE PICTURES AS IT IS AN UNREGULATED SHIPMENT.
